cosydoc.title: VisualDCT project info XML
cosydoc.audience: All users and developers interested in VisualDCT, mainly EPICS community.
cosydoc.scope: This project page contains all distribution files, sources, documentation and any other VisualDCT resources.

news.title: VisualDCT ported to Eclipse and Ant builds.
Package B alpha integration build available.
Package C (full graphical hierarchy support) release candidate.

document.comment: VisualDCT homepage where you can find all related manuals, articles and presentations.
document.title: VisualDCT homepage

document.comment: JCA Debug Plugin is a VisualDCT plugin allowing to display actual values in the control system inside the control boxes for records displayed within VisualDCT.
document.title: VisualDCT JCA Debug Plugin homepage
